Package com.im.njams.sdk.communication

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InstructionListener
    This interface must be implemented by components which wants to be notified for Instructions and registered on a Receiver.
    Receiver
    This interface must be implenmented by a new Receiver for a given communication
    ReplayHandler
    This interface must be implemented for replay handlers.
    Sender
    This interface must be implemented to create a nJAMS sender implementation which can send project and log-messages to nJAMS server.
    SenderExceptionListener
    ExceptionListener will be called when an exception occurred.
    ShareableReceiver<M>
    Interface to be implemented by Receivers that support receiving messages for multiple Njams instances.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractReceiver
    This class should be extended when implementing an new Receiver for a new communication type.
    AbstractReplayHandler
    A base implementation of the ReplayHandler interface that hides request/response handling from the actual implementation.
    AbstractSender
    Superclass for all Senders.
    CommunicationFactory
    Factory for creating Sender and Receiver
    DiscardMonitor
    This class is used to monitor message discarding.
    MaxQueueLengthHandler
    Implements the maxQueueLength handling for senders.
    MessageHeaders
    Constants used for message headers/properties.
    NjamsSender
    This class enforces the maxQueueLength setting.
    ReplayRequest
    Request for the replay command
    ReplayResponse
    Response for the replay command
    SenderPool
    Pool for AbstractSender implementations.
    SharedReceiverSupport<R extends AbstractReceiver & ShareableReceiver<M>,​M>
    A helper class that implements sharing receiver instances.
    Implementation notes: The actual implementations using this helper simply have to track adding and removing instances, and call SharedReceiverSupport.onInstruction(Object, Instruction, boolean) for each received (and valid) instruction.
    ThrottleMonitor
    This class is used to monitor message throttling.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConnectionStatus
    Enum for possible connection states
    DiscardPolicy
    Defines all implemented discard policies that can be set via NjamsSettings.PROPERTY_DISCARD_POLICY.
